tooltip.modern_companions.resurrection_s: Inactive: Hold a Nether Star in off-hand and Right-Click to infuse.
This scroll is missing companion data.
Activated: Right-click to resurrect the bound companion.
Needs a Nether Star in off-hand to activate.
tooltip.modern_companions.companion_move: You can only store companions you own.
tooltip.modern_companions.summoning_wand: Right-click to summon your companions: and their pets) to you.
message.modern_companions.assignment_wan: Select a companion with the wand first.
That companion is no longer nearby.
You can only assign chests for companions you own.
Assign a job before linking a drop-off chest.
Target block must be a container.
message.modern_companions.courier.unload: I can't reach that chest; its chunk isn't loaded.
message.modern_companions.courier.missin: The assigned chest is missing; clearing the link.
message.modern_companions.courier.full: The chest is full; I kept the cargo.
message.modern_companions.courier.delive: Cargo delivered to the assigned chest.
message.modern_companions.courier.stuck: I'm stuck trying to reach the chest at %s %s %s.
gui.modern_companions.journal.title: Companion Journal
gui.modern_companions.morale.label: Morale: %s
job.modern_companions.lumberjack.desc: Chops nearby natural trees and pockets the logs.
job.modern_companions.hunter.desc: Tracks hunt targets and keeps the party fed.
job.modern_companions.miner.desc: Surveys a full patrol cube, charts every ore, and tunnels with safe steps until the area is clear.
chat.modern_companions.miner.no_ore: No more ores left in my patrol area.
job.modern_companions.fisher.desc: Waits by water and reels in simple catches.
job.modern_companions.chef.desc: Cooks nearby raw food and tidies the output.
job.modern_companions.requires_tool: Needs the right tool in inventory to work this job.
trait.modern_companions.trait_glutton:
Glutton
        Bond XP Multiplier when Fed
trait.modern_companions.trait_discipline:
Disciplined
        XP Multiplier, Less Morale Loss
trait.modern_companions.trait_night_owl:
Night Owl
        Small Movement & Attack Bonus at Night
trait.modern_companions.trait_sun_blesse:
Sun-Blessed
        Small Movement & Attack Bonus during Day
trait.modern_companions.trait_melancholi:
Melancholic
        Minor Penalty when Morale is Low
backstory.modern_companions.none: No backstory recorded.. perhaps this companion is from an older time?
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_vi: Former village guard who still flinches at the sound of a midnight alarm bell.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_ex: Exiled noble chasing redemption far from shattered halls and whispered scandals.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_wa: Wandering mercenary for hire, loyal to coin but learning loyalty to people.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_ru: Scout who outlived ancient ruins and now refuses to enter one unprepared.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_re: Redeemed raider turned uneasy ally, trading pillaged loot for honest scars.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_ca: Obsessive cartographer of the wilds, forever chasing the edges of every map.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_su: Survivor from a ruined caravan who trusts steel and instinct more than promises.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_ci: Battle-hardened city watch veteran who traded a city wall for the open road.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_te: Former temple acolyte who swapped candles and prayers for steel and scars.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_gr: Quiet graveyard keeper who knows too many names carved into stone.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_ba: Ex-battlefield medic who learned to swing a blade when herbs were not enough.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_di: Disgraced knight seeking one last chance to make an oath mean something.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_mo: Monster hunter apprentice still carrying half-finished lessons and full terror.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_sm: Former smuggler’s runner who knows every back path no map dares show.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_gr: Grave robber turned guide who swears they only loot the truly abandoned.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_wa: Wandering scholar collecting stories, scars, and field notes in equal measure.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_ru: Refugee from a ruined town that no longer appears on any living map.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_po: Traveler who stepped through the wrong portal and never found the way home.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_he: Former hermit of the wilds coaxed back to company by louder monsters.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_ar: Retired arena gladiator who still listens for phantom crowds when blades clash.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_ex: Ex-cult initiate who left before the final rite and still hears the chanting at night.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_in: Innkeeper’s child who learned to read trouble in the faces of travelers long before steel.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_tr: Traveling bard who finally admitted songs about danger are easier than surviving it.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_fa: Failed guild artisan who forges their worth on the road after the guild stamped them 'unfit'.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_cu: Treasure seeker who brought home one cursed trinket too many and now hunts answers.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_st: Storm-wrecked sailor who trusts solid ground but still flinches at thunder.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_fi: Fire-scarred militia fighter who remembers the night their town burned and swore it’d be the last.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_or: Orphan of the roads raised by caravans, bandits, and whoever survived the longest.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_si: Silent penitent who speaks little of the crime they atone for with every swing.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_ar: Former keeper of arcane relics who knows just enough to be terrified of glowing artifacts.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_si: Ex-siege engineer who got tired of breaking walls and now prefers breaking monsters.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_du: Dungeon escapee who still counts exits the moment they enter any new room.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_ca: Once a cathedral librarian, now a walking archive of forbidden footnotes and half-burned tomes.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_wi: Local of a haunted witchwood who grew up treating whispers in the trees as normal weather.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_re: Reformed poacher who turned their traps and tracking toward monsters instead of beasts.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_lo: Rumored lost heir who avoids crowns but cannot quite escape the weight of old bloodlines.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_me: Memoryless stranger found at a crossroads with scars, reflexes, and no name of their own.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_mo: Moonlit duelist who once fought for sport in midnight courts and now duels for survival.
backstory.modern_companions.backstory_cl: Former clocktower watchman who learned to measure danger in heartbeats and chimes.
